Delete Revision from File

Use the Delete Revision from File dialog box (Actions | Delete Revision) to remove a revision from the versioned file and its archive. Deleting revisions also deletes the change description that was entered when the revision was checked in. You cannot delete revisions that are associated with promotion groups.

WARNING: This is a non-recoverable operation. Once you delete a revision, it cannot be restored.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Revision Accept the selected revision, enter a revision number to delete, or click the Browse button to select a revision.
Selected Files Tab
File list Review the selected files or projects.
Properties button Click to display information for the versioned file or a selected revision.
